title: What can I do in order to Y position was on top

comments.author: themcoo
comments.body:
It's because glyphs' coordinate space does not start in top left corner but at baseline.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2964157/212051226-291bb915-97d1-47f6-90b2-aa748f7fd39b.png)
Refer to: https://proandroiddev.com/android-and-typography-101-5f06722dd611

You need to position the text shifted in y-axis by -ascent (paint.FontMetrics.Ascent)
